Articles.Content: Whenever i start a new career i only get to choose the first 4 missions. after that non pop up. Ive time accelerated and done multiple fresh installs but no matter what nothing fixes it. Ill note the when i click the building itself for a split second i can see a list of missions but then they disappear.

Whenever i start a new career i only get to choose the first 4 missions. after that non pop up. Ive time accelerated and done multiple fresh installs but no matter what nothing fixes it. Ill note the when i click the building itself for a split second i can see a list of missions but then they disappear.

Hm, interesting. I assume you haven't touched the game files at all (Specifically the Squad folder founder under Gamedata)? Because that sounds like the game cannot locate any of the mission files. Can you provide an output log (found under KSPData). It'll help us to find a solution to this.

(If bought through the KSP Store)

To upload your Output file, find the install directory (where you installed the game), If you haven't renamed it then it will be called "KSP_win" (assuming windows, if your not using windows then its similar anyway). Find that folder, then enter one called KSPData. Scroll down until you see a file called Output log. Then open Google Drive, MediaFire, Dropbox, etc and then upload the file. From there get the sharable link from the website and then control past it here.
Are you in time warp when you access the building? Contracts won't show unless you're out of time warp.
https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B_x7Vw2jNjjxQThLMl94by1tMDA/view?usp=sharing, forgot the link in last post
Did you complete those 4 missions? Or you want more from the start?

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B_x7Vw2jNjjxQThLMl94by1tMDA/view?usp=sharing, forgot the link in last post

Thanks, we'll try to sift through this and help.

Did you complete those 4 missions? Or you want more from the start?

Good Q, have you?
i have finished the missions through multiple saves. ive launched rockets after i finished the missions and still nothing shows up.

You can edit that number in contracts.cfg ( gamedata/squad/contracts) The line is AverageAvailableContracts=n

-Nookos

This guy has a solution for that in the questions section.

This guy has a solution for that in the questions section.
I just checked and the average is at 10

- - - Updated - - -

I went into the folder with the contract icons and they are all blank besides the one that says marker. Would that cause this issue

You are playing the full game I assume, not the demo.

Did you mess with the stock parts at all? In one of my installs I broke the contracts when I deleted the stock solid boosters.

yup its the full game, never went into my part folder to delete anything.

- - - Updated - - -

Alright so i feel dumb now. I think my issue has been not raising enough rep. I just tried it again and the missions appeared. Sorry for the trouble guys.
